org.jetel.metadata

Class MetadataUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.metadata.MetadataUtils

  • public class MetadataUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utilities for data record metadata manipulation.

      MetadataUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • readMetadata

        public static DataRecordMetadata readMetadata(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel input)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads data record metadata from given channel. It is expected that the channel contains first an integer which indicates length of following XML metadata definition. Arbitrary data can follow the metadata definition in the stream. Note: if the stream contains only the XML metadata definition without the header with length of bytes, use directly DataRecordMetadataXMLReaderWriter.readMetadata() instead.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readMetadata

        public static DataRecordMetadata readMetadata(java.lang.String input)
        Creates data record metadata based on a string with XML definition.
        Parameters:
        input - XML definition of metadata
        Returns:
        data record metadata
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeMetadata

        public static void writeMetadata(DataRecordMetadata metadata,
                 java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel outputChannel)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the given metadata to the given output channel. First, length of XML representation of metadata is written and after that the XML representation of metadata is written.
        Parameters:
        metadata - written metadata
        outputChannel - target channel
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getNonAutofilledFieldsMetadata

        public static DataRecordMetadata getNonAutofilledFieldsMetadata(DataRecordMetadata metadata)
        Returns a duplicate of the given metadata with auto-filled fields removed.
        Parameters:
        metadata -
        Returns:
        metadata containing only fields without auto-filling

      • getSelectedFieldsMetadata

        public static DataRecordMetadata getSelectedFieldsMetadata(DataRecordMetadata metadata,
                                           int[] selectedFields)
        Returns a duplicate of the given metadata containing only fields with the selected indexes.
        Parameters:
        metadata -
        Returns:
        metadata containing only selected fields

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(DataRecordMetadata metadata1,
             DataRecordMetadata metadata2)
        This comparison is very slow - conversion to XML is used for metadata comparison.
        Parameters:
        metadata1 -
        metadata2 -
        Returns:
        true if and only if the given metadata are identical
